nodes.text: Virginia Landrunner was an individual who lived during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Landrunner was an acquaintance of the Corellian journalist Vani Korr of the Corellia Times newspaper. Around 1 ABY, Vani Korr mentioned Virginia Landrunner in Who are the Meatlumps?: an investigation article about the Meatlumps, a group of fanatical anti-technology criminals and terrorists.

Virginia Landrunner was mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Virginia Landrunner was mentioned in the second part of Vani Korr's article Who are the Meatlumps?, introduced in the game with the update dubbed "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
